title: Bicycle motion:tabular and analytical part - a

content.description: Ruth rode her bicycle on a straight trail. She recorded her velocity v(t) , in miles per hour, for selected values of t over the interval 0≤t≤2.4 , as shown in the table above, For 0<t≤2.4,v(t)>0 .
content.question: Use the data in the table to approximate Ruth's acceleration at time t=1.4 hours. Show the computations that lead to your answer. Indicate units of measure.

frqParts.text: Use the data in the table to approximate Ruth's acceleration at time t=1.4 hours. Show the computations that lead to your answer. Indicate units of measure.

topic.text: 2.1: Defining Average and Instantaneous Rates of Change at a Point

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Identify mathematical information from graphical, numerical, analytical, and/or verbal representations.
